channel.title: [Not a 508] All Bout Pk Source+Client! Download Now!
channel.description:
All Bout Pk Source + Client has been released. Took me two days to edit this baby and it's done. Originally I thought I downloaded a 508 source. Turns out I didn't, so I decided to release V2 of it instead of just not doing anything with it.
Credits: [Total 120%]
Hailmerry7 - Owner and Coder of All Bout Pk's V1 and V2 = 60% Rubik's Scape - Source and Client of All Bout Pk V2 = 40% I Love Yew - Set up Forums and has been Managing them = 20%
I'm hoping for V3 to be complete 508 Source and Client.
Features: Credits to:
Highscores - Rubik's Scape Skills Area - Rubik's Scape Staffzones - Hailmerry7 Shops - Hailmerry7 Most Commands - Rubik's Scape New Npcs and Portal teles - Hailmerry7 New stuff at Home - Hailmerry7 New PkBox - Hailmerry7 Barrows - Rubik's Scape Godsword Minigame - Rubik's Scape
Now for some Pictures: Home! [img]http://[IMG]http://i304.photobucket.com/albums/nn191/hailmerry7/HomeV21.jpg[/img][/img] Home Again! [img]http://[IMG]http://i304.photobucket.com/albums/nn191/hailmerry7/HomeV22.jpg[/img][/img] Shops! [img]http://[IMG]http://i304.photobucket.com/albums/nn191/hailmerry7/ShopsV2.jpg[/img][/img] Skills!! [img]http://[IMG]http://i304.photobucket.com/albums/nn191/hailmerry7/SkillsV2.jpg[/img][/img] Jad!! [img]http://[IMG]http://i304.photobucket.com/albums/nn191/hailmerry7/Jad.jpg[/img][/img] Godsword Minigame!! [img]http://[IMG]http://i304.photobucket.com/albums/nn191/hailmerry7/GsMiniV2.jpg[/img][/img] Slayer!! [img]http://[IMG]http://i304.photobucket.com/albums/nn191/hailmerry7/SlayerV2.jpg[/img][/img] Barrows!! [img]http://[IMG]http://i304.photobucket.com/albums/nn191/hailmerry7/BarrowsV2.jpg[/img][/img] Pk!! [img]http://[IMG]http://i304.photobucket.com/albums/nn191/hailmerry7/PkV2.jpg[/img][/img] Staffzone 1!!!!! [img]http://[IMG]http://i304.photobucket.com/albums/nn191/hailmerry7/Staffzone1V2.jpg[/img][/img] Staffzone 2!!!!! [img]http://[IMG]http://i304.photobucket.com/albums/nn191/hailmerry7/Staffzone2V2.jpg[/img][/img] Staffzone Minigame!!!!! [img]http://[IMG]http://i304.photobucket.com/albums/nn191/hailmerry7/StaffzoneMinigameV2.jpg[/img][/img] PkBox!!!! [img]http://[IMG]http://i304.photobucket.com/albums/nn191/hailmerry7/PkBoxV2.jpg[/img][/img] PkBox Add-On!!!!! Banks up on top of hill! [img]http://[IMG]http://i304.photobucket.com/albums/nn191/hailmerry7/PkBoxAdd-OnV2.jpg[/img][/img]
There you have it....MY DESCENT, YET SUCKY, 2 DAY SERVER!!!
Now for the Downloads:
Source: http://www.mediafire.com/file/ly3ymjrzmhi/All Bout Pk Source V2.rar Client: http://www.mediafire.com/file/bnwwnhmyjn4/Client.rar
